title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1401.4 - Hours for public inspection
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1401.4 - Hours for public inspection

State Regulations
(a) Each agency shall accept requests for
public access to records and produce records during all hours they are
regularly open for business. (b) In
agencies which do not have daily regular business hours, a written procedure
shall be established by which a person may arrange an appointment to inspect
and copy records. Such procedure shall include the name, position, address and
phone number of the party to be contacted for the purpose of making an
appointment. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1401.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
